bibl.title: A Greek Papyrus in Armenian Script.
bibl.note: P. Paris Bibl. Nat. Inv. Arm 332 [éd. partielle: Georges CUENDET, Un papyrus grec en caractères arméniens, AnnPhilHist 5 (1938) pp. 217-226]. 'Educational' texts in Greek: conversational phrases; rudimentary verb conjugations; word-lists arranged by topic; chreiae and sententiae. Faiyum (?), 5th-7th century.
CLACKSON James, A Greek Papyrus in Armenian Script.
141.4 P. Paris Bibl. Nat. Inv. Arm 332
